page.title: 01The Ribchester Block
page.content: Ribchester is a small old village. There are quite a few pubs and rest- aurants.The shops are mainly food shops.We have a lot of marshy woods,the main wood is Dewhurst Wood with a weir and a lovely waterfall. We have five churches and two schools. The amenities we have are few, the main one being the {Roman museum}. There are a lot of foot- paths and farms .There are a lot of dairy farms.The museum is all Roman and was built in the middle of a Roman Fort.Most of the village is countryside, grazing land and houses.A lot of tourists come to the village for a day out because of the scenery and the Roman Baths .The river is slightly polluted but not as much as some rivers are.Most of the buidings are old.
